襥字的基本解释

襥
fú
古同“襆”。

襥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》房玉切，入燭，奉。］
亦作“襥1”。
(1)用以覆盖或包裹衣物等的布单、巾帕。
(2)谓用布单或巾帕包裹。
(3)包裹，包袱。
(4)用作表示包裹、包袱的量词。
(5)被；行李。
[②]［pú］
［《廣韻》博木切，入屋，幫。］
亦作“襥2”。
古深衣的下裳。

襥字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襥； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1126第23
【正字通】同襆。

襥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
襥字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
fú
Gu Tong is "sick".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guang Yun" Fang Yu cuts, enters the candle, and bong. ]
Also known as "襥1".
(1) Sheets and towels used to cover or wrap clothing, etc.
(2) It is said to be wrapped with a cloth sheet or towel.
(3) Package, burden.
(4) Used as a quantifier for parcels and burdens.
(5) By; baggage.
[②]［pú］
["Guangyun" Bo Muqie, enter the house, help. ]
Also known as "襥2".
The lower garment of Gu Shenyi.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襥; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1126 Page 23
【Zhengzitong】Same as infatuation.
